title: Being Alive
lyrics:
These are the days we'll remember all of our lives
Moments of magic under the cinema in the sky
And the reflections in your eyes are painted like the sunrise
These are the days we'll remember all of our lives
Being alive, alive

Being alive, ooh-woah, ooh-woah

Being alive



These are the days we'll remember all of our lives

Moments of magic under the cinema in the sky

And the reflections in your eyes are painted like the sunrise

These are the days we'll remember all of our lives



Being alive, alive

Being alive, ooh-woah, ooh-woah

Being alive
